about_the_game:
Compatible with Remote Play Together - Play online with friends even if they don't own the game!

Monster Jaunt is a 4-player minigame party with more variety and less randomness. Compete in a diverse assortment of minigames between rounds of a simple-but-deep strategic board game.

Diverse Minigames

From high-speed penguin races to competitive inventory management to cerebral memory challenges, twenty-three challenging and varied minigames await. Whether you want a fresh take on a classic minigame or a brand new concept you've never played before, there's a minigame for you!

Lightweight Strategy Board Game

Monsters have arrived from another dimension to...have a great vacation? Between minigames, draft monsters and plan vacation routes in a Euro-inspired board game. No more rolling dice and hoping for a win!


Throwback Aesthetic

'90s kids, rejoice! Monster Jaunt takes visual inspiration from 3D greats of the mid- to late-'90s -- Bright colors, geometrics textures, few polygons, hidden cheats, and cheery MIDI tunes.

Flexible Options

Play with 1-4 players and fill in with bots. Disable minigames you don't like or increase the odds of your favorites appearing. Don't button mash if you don't want to. Remap controls however you need. Only two buttons + directions are required.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 9600 or equivalent
  • Storage: 720 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Storage: 720 MB available space

name: Monster Jaunt

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 9600 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 720 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 720 MB available space

short_description: A minigame party for experienced players. Compete in 23 diverse minigames with high skill ceilings and low randomness. Take simultaneous turns on the board, bringing groups of monsters to see the sights on the best vacation possible. It's a party game that *won't* make you hate your friends!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
